thread.title: Kelsey Haight

author: Kelsey Haight
title: Kelsey Haight
text: I had a really pleasant interaction with Renardo. He helped explain all of the intricate charges for my first time Verizon internet and cable use. I kept having to interrupt the calls but we managed to get my service set up in two days, and I was able to easily get back in touch with Renardo directly to proceed. It was super helpful and I'm looking forward to the rest of my Verizon experience.
